User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64; rv:7.0a2) Gecko/20110715 Firefox/7.0a2
Build ID: 20110715042002

Steps to reproduce:

Open a folder, click the magnifying glass to show the quicksearch bar, enter some term to start filtering.


Actual results:

The message list is filtered. It's only possible to return to unfiltered view by deleting the text, pressing Escape, or clicking the magnifying glass icon again.


Expected results:

There used to be a "cancel" button (a small cross) on the right end of the textbox for the search terms in the TB version where quicksearch was first added. This was at some point removed. Please add it again.
comments.author: blog@tessarakt.de
